fields.headline: Football results
fields.bodyText: CHAMPIONS LEAGUE (Phase Two) Group C Real Madrid 1 - 0 Porto Solari 83 Sparta Prague 0 - 2 Panathinaikos Karagounis 39, Konstantinou 71 Group D Bayer Leverkusen 1 - 1 Arsenal Kirsten 90 | Pires 56 Juventus 0 - 0 D Coruna UEFA CUP Fourth round, first leg Roda JC 0 - 1 Milan Mari 29 Valencia 3 - 0 Servette Hilton 3 (og), Aimar 47, Salva 58
